title: Surrender
lyrics:
11 Contributors
Surrender Lyrics
[Verse 1]
I can never get enough
Addicted to your love like sugar
Oh, I want you way too much
Even if I could escape, I wouldn't
[Pre-Chorus]
I'm weak
And you don't even say a word
But your eyes speak
I feel so endless
I'm so helpless
[Chorus]
Got my hands in the sky, baby, I, I give up, I surrender
I got used to the thought that I'd probably love you forever
Always on a freefall, fallin' into your arms, fallin'
Got my hands in the sky, baby, I, I give up, I surrender
[Post-Chorus]
(Surrender)
(Surrender)
[Drop]
[Verse 2]
There ain't no going back
When you feel the way I'm feelin'
You know you got me bad
Don't wakе me up if I'm still dreamin'



[Pre-Chorus]
I feel so endlеss
I'm so helpless
[Chorus]
Got my hands in the sky, baby, I, I give up, I surrender
I got used to the thought that I'd probably love you forever
Always on a freefall, fallin' into your arms, fallin'
Got my hands in the sky, baby, I, I give up, I surrender
[Post-Chorus]
(Surrender)
(Surrender)
[Drop]
[Outro]
Got my hands in the sky, baby, I, I give up, I surrender
I got used to the thought that I'd probably love you forever
